get.summary: Get Customer Loyalty shares details for a given customer based on externalCustomerID.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Unique customer id maintained by external system.

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: (optional) Unique store id where customer is transacting

get.summary: Gets Customer Ledger details for given customer based on externalCustomerId. Customer Ledger result will be sorted based on the transaction date and sorting order can be controlled based on orderBy attribute.

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: Unique customer id maintained by external system.

parameters.name: cardCode
parameters.description: Unique code to represent a loyatly card.

parameters.name: dateStart
parameters.description: Start date of the date range for which results should be returned.

parameters.name: dateEnd
parameters.description: End date of the date range for which results should be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page for which results should be returned.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: No of items to be returned as part of the page result.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting order.

post.summary: API to know earnable/burnable points for a specific customerâ€™s order.

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: Unique customer id maintained by external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyType
parameters.description: Type of loyalty.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Transaction data needed to determine burn and earn points.

post.summary: API to process redemption of the points based on a transaction.

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: Unique customer id maintained by external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyReferenceId
parameters.description:
Unique reference id against which loyalty points earn/burn should be recorded.
This is a unique reference maintained by an external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyType
parameters.description: Type of loyalty.

parameters.name: pointsToRedeem
parameters.description: Maximum points that can be redeemed in a transaction.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Transaction data needed to determine burn and earn points.

post.summary: API to issue points for a transaction. Points will be calculated based on the earn rules configured as part of the loyalty program. We will send communication to the customer if points >0 and if communication channel is configured.

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: Unique customer id maintained by external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyReferenceId
parameters.description:
Unique reference id against which loyalty points earn/burn should be recorded.
This is a unique reference maintained by an external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyType
parameters.description: Type of loyalty.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Transaction data needed to determine burn and earn points.

post.summary: API to issue points for a transaction based on orderId. Points will be calculated based on the earn rules configured as part of the loyalty program. We will send communication to the customer if points >0 and if communication channel is configured.

parameters.name: loyaltyReferenceId
parameters.description:
Unique reference id against which loyalty points earn/burn should be recorded.
This is a unique reference maintained by an external system.

post.summary: API to cancel an already blocked or processed customer loyalty payment.

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: Unique customer id maintained by external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyReferenceId
parameters.description:
Unique reference id against which loyalty points earn/burn should be recorded.
This is a unique reference maintained by an external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyType
parameters.description: Type of loyalty.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: Unique id for an organization maintained by external system.

post.summary: API to issue points for a transaction. Points will be calculated based on the earn rules configured as part of the loyalty program.

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: Unique customer id maintained by external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyReferenceId
parameters.description:
Unique reference id against which loyalty points earn/burn should be recorded.
This is a unique reference maintained by an external system.

parameters.name: loyaltyType
parameters.description: Type of loyalty.

parameters.name: statusCode
parameters.description:
Status of the loyalty transaction. It's possible values are as follows:
INITIATED-Transaction has been initiated.
COMPLETED-Transaction has been completed.
CANCELLED-Transaction has been cancelled.
CALCULATE-Ready to calculate earnable/burnable points.
NOT_ELIGIBLE-Customer not eligible for transaction.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Transaction data needed to determine burn and earn points.

get.summary: API to verify loyalty transaction status.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Type of event.

parameters.name: loyaltyDate
parameters.description: Transaction date.

parameters.name: recordCount
parameters.description: Transaction record count.

get.summary: This API returns loyalty program configuration.

parameters.name: loyaltyCode
parameters.description: Unique code which determines the loyalty program. (also used as loyaltyProgramCode)

parameters.name: loyaltyCardCode
parameters.description: Unique code which determines the loyalty card.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: Unique id for an organization maintained by external system.

post.summary: Updates the business rules defined. The following ruletypes are implemented for JFL.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description:
Input for Update-Business-Rule-by-Rule-Type API. It is a JSON containing
ruleLevel: Possible values of the rule level. Example :ORGANIZATION/ STORE/ APPLICATION/ LOYALTY.
ruleType: String indicating the rule type.
ruleDefaultValue: Default value of the rule.
